title: Attachment Datatype Schema
description: This type is for containing or referencing attachments - additional data content defined in other formats. The most common use of this type is to include images or reports in some report format such as PDF. However, it can be used for any data that has a MIME type.

contentType.description: Mime type of the content, with charset etc.

height.description: Height of the image in pixels (photo/video)

size.description: Number of bytes of content (if url provided)

title.description: Label to display in place of the data

url.description: Uri where the data can be found

width.description: Width of the image in pixels (photo/video)
